content: CrossFi Token Sale: 1 June - 1 July MinePlex is a cutting-edge digital ecosystem at the forefront of developing advanced payment solutions for the modern era. Leveraging their innovative CrossFi technology, the company seamlessly combines the stability of traditional finance with the transparency and security of blockchain technology.The primary objective of MinePlex is to extend the reach and impact of blockchain technology by offering users user-friendly and accessible financial tools that simplify the utilization of cryptocurrencies, making them as convenient as traditional currencies. Established in 2020 and headquartered in Singapore, MinePlex has successfully introduced nine tangible products to the cryptocurrency market. With a thriving community spanning across 68 countries worldwide, MinePlex addresses common challenges faced by participants in the crypto space, fostering meaningful solutions for all.MinePlex CrossFi Token Sale Details : https://icogems.com/ico/CrossFi
